text:
Grand Concourse, west side, north from E. 188th Street, showing the thoroughfare passing underneath the E. Fordham Road bridge. The W.P.A. sign indicates that a highway project is to be started here.
1937
W.P.A. Photo
Five Boroughs Project
title: Bronx: Grand Concourse - 188th Street (East)

text:
Grand Concourse, n. fr. 188th St., Bronx
Neg. no. A-1230
P. L. Sperr, photographer
July 19, 1941
title: Bronx: Grand Concourse - 188th Street
